content: I've done some diagnostics work in the past and would like to get ping to WG-diagnostics on GitHub, for discussion. And it seems the WG hasn't migrated to rust-lang/team repo so it'd be nice if we did so like other teams/WGs. Could I join the WG and help you migrate?
cc @Esteban Küber as the lead
@Yuki Okushi sure! We haven't been very organized as it is been a small rotating group of people working on this, we could take this as the trigger to become more methodical
